Package game.items

A package including all items created for the game, such as weapons and magical items.
Since:
1.0
See Also:
java.awt
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Bottle
    Class representing the Bottle.
    Coin
    Class representing the coin
    Fire  
    FireFlower
    Class representing a Fire Flower
    HealingWater
    Drinking this water will increase the drinker's hit points/healing by 50 hit points.
    Key  
    MagicalItem
    Abstract base class representing a physical magical items in the game world.
    PowerStar
    Class representing the Power Star.
    PowerWater
    When the water is consumed, it increases the drinker's base/intrinsic attack damage by 15.
    SuperMushroom
    Class representing the Super Mushroom.
    Wrench
    Class representing a Wrench A weapon specifically used to destroy Koopa's shell
